title: Active & Passive Voice
description: Can you tell the difference between active and passive voice? Put your grammar skills to the test!

questions.question: Which sentence is in passive voice?
options: The cat was chased by the dog.
The cat ran from the dog.
The dog is chasing the cat.

questions.question: Convert to active voice: 'The cake was baked by Grandma.'
options: The cake is baked by Grandma.

questions.question: Which sentence is in active voice?
options: The song was sung by the choir.
The letter was written by John.
The ball was kicked over the fence.

questions.question: What is the passive form of 'The mechanic repaired the car'?
options: The mechanic was repairing the car.
The car was repaired by the mechanic.

questions.question: Which sentence uses passive voice correctly?
options: The report was written by the committee.
The committee the report was written.
Written was the report by committee.

questions.question: In passive voice, the subject of the sentence ___.
Which word is a clue that a sentence is in passive voice?
Convert to passive voice: 'Shakespeare wrote Hamlet.'
Which is the best reason to use passive voice?
options: Passive voice should never be used
When the doer of the action is unknown or unimportant

questions.question: Identify the voice: 'The window was broken during the storm.'
Which sentence is in active voice?
options: The dinner was prepared by the chef.
The road was blocked by fallen trees.

questions.question: What is the passive form of 'Everyone admires her courage'?
options: Her courage is admired by everyone.
Everyone is admired by her courage.

questions.question: Which passive sentence is in the future tense?
options: The house is being painted now.
The house will be painted tomorrow.
The house was painted last week.

questions.question: Convert to active voice: 'The novel was read by millions of people.'
options: The novel read millions of people.
Millions of people read the novel.
Millions of people were reading the novel.

questions.question: Which sentence uses the passive voice in the present continuous?
options: The bridge will be built soon.
The bridge is being built right now.
The bridge was built last year.
The bridge has been built already.
